languages.text: "Энрих, наберись терпения. Как только преступник будет найден, твоих людей отпустят".

traits.locale_text: "Энрих, наберись терпения. Как только преступник будет найден, твоих людей отпустят".

languages.text: "Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."
languages.original_text: "Энрих, наберись терпения. Как только преступник будет найден, твоих людей отпустят".

traits.locale_text: "Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."
"Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."
"Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."
"Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."
"Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."

languages.text: “要保持耐心，艾因里奇。只要找到了罪魁祸首，你的氏族成员就会被立刻释放。”
languages.original_text: "Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."

traits.locale_text: “要保持耐心，艾因里奇。只要找到了罪魁祸首，你的氏族成员就会被立刻释放。”

languages.text: «Tenga paciencia, Einrich. Tan pronto descubramos al culpable, liberaremos a su gente».
languages.original_text: "Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."

traits.locale_text: «Tenga paciencia, Einrich. Tan pronto descubramos al culpable, liberaremos a su gente».

languages.text: 「辛抱してください、アインリッヒ。犯人が見つかり次第、あなたの仲間は解放されます」
languages.original_text: "Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."

traits.locale_text: 「辛抱してください、アインリッヒ。犯人が見つかり次第、あなたの仲間は解放されます」

languages.text: "Habt Geduld, Einrich. Sobald der Täter gefunden ist, werde Eure Leute freigelassen."
languages.original_text: "Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Geduld, Einrich. Sobald der Täter gefunden ist, werde Eure Leute freigelassen."

languages.text: « Patience, Einrich. Vos gens seront libérés dès que le coupable aura été démasqué. »
languages.original_text: "Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."

traits.locale_text: « Patience, Einrich. Vos gens seront libérés dès que le coupable aura été démasqué. »

languages.text: "Sabırlı ol Einrich. Suçlu bulunduğu an hepsi serbest bırakılacak."
languages.original_text: "Have patience, Einrich. As soon as the culprit is found, your people will be released."
